name: 黃琮昇
objective:
本課程以鋰電池為例，將深入探討鋰電池的電網與電動車領域與相關領域之主要研究課題，並應用控制理論實現電池系統鑑別、電池電量狀態與電池健康狀態量測。本課程針對研究所學生開設，藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力，並透過定期期刊文章研討，加強學生的閱讀與簡報專業論文之能力。
This course takes lithium-ion batteries as an example. It introduces current research challenges of lithium-ion batteries’ applications (i.e., electrical vehicles (EVs) and power grids). It then investigates battery system identification approaches, battery state-of-charge (SOC) estimation algorithms, battery state-of-health (SOH) prognosis algorithms, and related control theories. This course is set targeting to institute students, where the goal of this course is to help them gain necessary domain knowledge, develop simulation and implementation skills, and improve capabilities of reading and reporting journal papers.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-3: Battery Management System (BMS)
Week 4-6: Battery Cell Modeling and Simulations
Week 7-9: Battery Pack Modeling and Simulations
Week 10-12: Battery State-of-Charge Estimation
Week 13-15: Battery State-of-Health Estimation
Week 16-18: Project
materials:
Textbook:
Gregory L. Plett, "Battery Management Systems, Volume I: Battery Modeling," Artech House, 2015.
Gregory L. Plett, "Battery Management Systems, Volume II: Equivalent-Circuit Methods," Artech House, 2015.
